name: Bioborne-P
description:
Low Stakes High-Rolling | Make a sci-fi game
Hosted by Too Many Turtles

Here is "Bioborne - P" with a focus on Planets.

Please give me like a week and I'll add additional content!

BETA VERSION - NEW CONTENT COMING SOON!

  • You are a galactic emperor who is trying to rule the galaxy
  • Unlock planets by generating energy from minerals/gases from planets
  • Each sector of the galaxy contains 5 planets, each planet locked by a set amount of required resources (1 sector for now)
  • Planets:
    • Phillon 84Z
      • Least Valuable Minerals: quartz, olivine, calcite
    • Drilles 5S6
      • Accessory Minerals: galena, graphite, zircon
    • Trolla 7M
      • Uncommon Minerals: diamond, gold, silver
    • Moth YI63
      • Rare Metals: Tantalum, Tellurium, Rhenium
    • Siri J34
      • Gases: radon, argon, krypton
  • Once you obtain enough minerals, you have conquered the planet and can proceed to the next planet.
  • Your planets may come under attack from enemy intruders. You can go back to your planets and engage in space wars. Defeating the enemies will put a bounty on you, which may make conquering other planets more difficult/slower. Losing in combat will end the game and you have to start over
  • You can make upgrades to your army, spacecraft and planets so you can become stronger and items become more available. Trade with other emperors or invade their planets to steal resources

- FEATURES CURRENTLY AVAILABLE -

  • Travel to 2 planets
  • Click on minerals to mine them in both planets
  • Hire miners to mine resources for you
  • Upgrade player to increase income per second
  • Impressive visuals and soothing particle effects/moving backgrounds
  • Amazing soundtrack from bensound.org
  • HD graphics and user interface
  • Auto-save never lose progress!
  • Pick up and play
  • And more coming soon!
